docs.snippet: Continuing an N.B.A. trend of teams firing coaches after successful seasons, the Golden State Warriors fired Mark Jackson, ending a three-year tenure in which the Warriors vaulted into one of the better, more entertaining teams in the league....
docs.lead_paragraph: Continuing an N.B.A. trend of teams firing coaches after successful seasons, the Golden State Warriors fired Mark Jackson, ending a three-year tenure in which the Warriors vaulted into one of the better, more entertaining teams in the league.
docs.abstract: Golden State Warriors fire coach Mark Jackson, continuing NBA trend of firing coaches despite successful, 50-victory seasons; Warriors became one of the better, more entertaining teams in the league under Jackson's three-year tenure.

headline.main: You Won 50 Games, Coach? Your Job Security’s Still Zero

docs.abstract: Los Angeles Clippers star Chris Paul, arguably the best point guard in the NBA, puts in strong performance during team's victory over Oklahoma City Thunder in first game of playoff series; while Paul has shown signs of maturing in recent years, his defiant spirit and high energy were on display during game.

docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column argues that by winning the NBA's MVP award, Kevin Durant has set himself up for close scrutiny and criticism should Oklahoma City Thunder fall short in the playoffs.

headline.main: Titles, Not M.V.P.s, Define the Greats

docs.snippet: Leagues have little interest in taking over the day-to-day operation of franchises, but recent history offers examples of how to navigate such a process....
docs.lead_paragraph: Leagues have little interest in taking over the day-to-day operation of franchises, but recent history offers examples of how to navigate such a process.
docs.abstract: Recent history offers a variety of examples in which professional sports leagues have taken over franchises; information could be useful to NBA Commissioner Adam Silver as he prepares to hire an executive to run the Los Angeles Clippers while he begins the process of stripping owner Donald Sterling of his franchise.

headline.main: Examples of How Clippers Could Benefit From League Takeover
